org.apache.spark.mllib.feature

Class StandardScaler

  • Object
    • org.apache.spark.mllib.feature.StandardScaler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, VectorTransformer

    public class StandardScaler
extends Object
implements VectorTransformer
    :: DeveloperApi :: Standardizes features by removing the mean and scaling to unit variance using column summary statistics on the samples in the training set.

    See Also:

    • Method Detail

      • fit

        public StandardScaler fit(RDD<Vector> data)
        Computes the mean and variance and stores as a model to be used for later scaling.

        Parameters:
        data - The data used to compute the mean and variance to build the transformation model.
        Returns:
        This StandardScalar object.

      • transform

        public Vector transform(Vector vector)
        Applies standardization transformation on a vector.

        Specified by:
        transform in interface VectorTransformer
        Parameters:
        vector - Vector to be standardized.
        Returns:
        Standardized vector. If the variance of a column is zero, it will return default 0.0 for the column with zero variance.
